trans-unit.target: TEXT_REGROCNOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00198_MOBHUNTERR1F1_000_1<tab>An adventurer on the trail of an elite mark, if I'm not mistaken. Go on and state your business, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>.
TEXT_REGROCNOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00198_A1_000_2<tab>Tell me about the rank B elite mark. (Naul)
TEXT_REGROCNOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00198_A1_000_3<tab>Tell me about the rank A elite mark. (Marraco)
TEXT_REGROCNOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00198_A1_000_4<tab>Tell me about the rank S elite mark. (Safat)
TEXT_REGROCNOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00198_MOBHUNTERR1F1_000_10<tab>I hunt, I read, and one more thing─I help.
TEXT_REGROCNOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00198_MOBHUNTERR1F1_000_11<tab>It's a simple life. If the hunt succeeds, I collect the bounty in Allied Seals. If I fail, well, there are always more books to read.
TEXT_REGROCNOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00198_MOBHUNTERR1F1_000_12<tab>Now then, is there anything I can help you with? But of course there is─you adventurers are always getting in over your heads.

TEXT_REGROCNOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00198_MOBHUNTERR1F1_000_13<tab>And speaking of “over your head,” never forget that marks are ranked according to danger. You'll not easily find a rank S mark, let alone bag one.

TEXT_REGROCNOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00198_MOBHUNTERR1F1_000_20<tab>Ah, yes. You know how Ishgard is about dragons. The Holy See managed to get Naul and a few other dragons on to the elite mark list. A favor to be repaid in kind, I'm sure.

TEXT_REGROCNOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00198_MOBHUNTERR1F1_000_21<tab>“The dragons Naul and Svara are best known for their attack on the Steel Vigil, which left the fortress a smoking ruin. Notable casualties include the third son of House Haillenarte...”

TEXT_REGROCNOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00198_MOBHUNTERR1F1_000_30<tab>Every High House of Ishgard has its own dragon in a bonnet, don't they? An enemy without keeps order within. The dragon Marraco is to be hunted for the crime of mistaking almost a dozen of House Durendaire's knights for kindling.

TEXT_REGROCNOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00198_MOBHUNTERR1F1_000_31<tab>“An impressive physical specimen by all accounts, the dragon Marraco can easily withstand a direct hit from dragonslayer cannons, thus requiring enterprising hunters to exercise some forethought in their choice of arms.”
TEXT_REGROCNOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00198_MOBHUNTERR1F1_000_40<tab>“A winning combination of size and agility, the dragon Safat spends much of its time winging its way through the Sea of Clouds.
TEXT_REGROCNOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00198_MOBHUNTERR1F1_000_41<tab>“A scream or two, however, never fails to bring Safat streaking down to its prey, attuned as the beast is to terror and misery.
TEXT_REGROCNOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00198_MOBHUNTERR1F1_000_42<tab>“Some hunters have been known to subject themselves to hair-raising experiences in order to bait the dragon. Results have been mixed.”
